header.rec_loc: Campervan journey from Białka Tatrzańska to Tarnow, Poland.
header.topics: What the speakers see on the journey, trip expenses, social arrangements & friends, clearing the clutter & travelling, hitchhikers, food, friendships.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) while driving in a campervan from Białka Tatrzańska to Tarnow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language

if I haven't touched it in a year it's gone I don't need it I've never understood the concept of for example underbed storage

and I think the boxes that I'm doing now these two metal containers I've done one of them and I basically wanna turn two metal boxes into one
erm and they're just like little boxes with a little carry handle I think they're designed for file storage originally

not that I've asked him still but I will in February and then when I return I want just enough stuff to live in the camper van
so I know from having lived in it for like a month touring Ireland for example I've you know got a good idea of kitchen utensils and

things like that and it seems a bit stupid to keep something that's so from when you're so young but

all of the erm er job leaving cards have gone
and I think it is just sort of yeah love
those people that I've had relationships with

so small you bump into people like a month later in a different place it's like oh I remember you erm yeah and you tend to end up on erm like the bus routes and I started avoiding the bus routes cos you tended to get younger people in hostels
that get pissed and stay up late and I had a rental car for a lot of that trip and
so consciously chose to get off the beaten track and that's where I tended to find different sorts of hitchhikers
who like me wanted to get off
yeah wanted to get off the beaten track lots of women travelling on their own in New Zealand
perfectly safe country to do that in erm so yeah I gave lifts to lots of single women also couples groups of men you know just
again on instinct and vibes man

they went on quite a long journey oh goodness me

I can put you up for the night and
